title: Implement Secure Login
description: As a customer, I want to securely log into the self-service portal using multi-factor authentication, so that my account remains protected from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Must support OTP and biometric verification. Compliance with industry-standard security protocols.
acceptance_criteria: User can log in using multi-factor authentication. Unauthorized access is prevented.
test_cases: Given user credentials, When login is attempted, Then prompt for second factor for authentication.

title: Implement Secure Session Management
description: As a customer, I want secure session management with automatic timeout, so that my session will end if it remains inactive for a period.
attributes_and_rules: Sessions must time out automatically after a defined period. Secure session handling to prevent session hijacking.
acceptance_criteria: Sessions end automatically after inactivity. Unauthorized session resumes are prevented.
test_cases: Given an active session, When it remains inactive, Then the session should timeout automatically.

title: Display User-Specific Products
description: As a customer, I want to see banking products and services tailored to my profile, so that I can easily access relevant options.
attributes_and_rules: Personalization based on user profile data. Real-time accuracy from core banking system.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows products and services specific to user profile.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When accessing the dashboard, Then relevant products and services are displayed.

title: Highlight Recent Transactions
description: As a customer, I want to view recent transactions on my dashboard, so that I can quickly review my account activities.
attributes_and_rules: Display recent transactions and notifications. Quick access to common tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard highlights recent transactions and displays notifications.
test_cases: Given recent transactions, When accessing the dashboard, Then recent transactions should be highlighted.

epic_title: Responsive UI/UX Design and Device Compatibility
title: Develop Responsive Interface
description: As a user, I want a consistent interface across devices, so that I can access the portal seamlessly on desktop, tablet, or mobile.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure adaptive layouts and accessibility standards. Optimize for different screen sizes and maintain usability.
acceptance_criteria: Interface adapts to various devices while maintaining usability and performance.
test_cases: Given different device types, When accessing the portal, Then the interface should adapt seamlessly.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Account Creation Workflow
description: As a customer, I want to open new accounts with minimal clicks, so that I can quickly set up new services.
attributes_and_rules: Include form auto-filling, progress tracking, and inline validations.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily open new accounts with streamlined steps.
test_cases: Given an account creation form, When filling out the form, Then the process should be efficient with minimal clicks.

epic_title: Request Tracking, Notifications, and Status Updates
title: Implement Real-Time Request Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I can remain informed about their progress.
attributes_and_rules: Include visual progress tracking and update triggers for key events.
acceptance_criteria: Requests can be tracked in real-time with key status updates.
test_cases: Given a submitted request, When checking the status, Then the updates should be reflected in real-time.

epic_title: Document Upload and Application Resume Capability
title: Implement Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely within the portal, so that my sensitive information remains protected.
attributes_and_rules: Encrypt uploaded files and validate accepted formats.
acceptance_criteria: Documents can be securely uploaded and accepted formats are validated.
test_cases: Given a document upload feature, When uploading documents, Then ensure they are encrypted and validated.

title: Secure API Integration
description: As a developer, I want secure and reliable API integrations with the core banking system, so that real-time data exchange for accounts and transactions is achieved.
attributes_and_rules: Secure API, data consistency, error-handling mechanisms.
acceptance_criteria: Secure API ensures real-time data exchange and consistency.
test_cases: Given API endpoints, When fetching or updating data, Then data should be handled securely and consistently.

epic_title: Data Management and Independent Database Optimization
title: Establish Optimized Database
description: As a system architect, I want a separate, optimized database for portal data, so that performance and reliability are ensured.
attributes_and_rules: Proper indexing, backup procedures, and synchronization with core banking data.
acceptance_criteria: Database provides high availability, performance, and reliability.
test_cases: Given a separate database, When managing portal data, Then ensure performance and reliability are maintained.

title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As a system admin, I want to restrict access based on roles and authorization levels, so that user privileges are managed securely.
attributes_and_rules: Create user role hierarchies and map permissions.
acceptance_criteria: Users can only access functions they are authorized to.
test_cases: Given user roles, When accessing services, Then enforce the correct privileges and permissions.

title: Track User Activity
description: As a compliance officer, I want detailed activity logs for user interactions, so that compliance and troubleshooting needs are met.
attributes_and_rules: Securely store logs and ensure data retention policies comply with regulations.
acceptance_criteria: User activities are logged and stored securely for compliance.
test_cases: Given user interactions, When logging activities, Then ensure they are stored securely and can be accessed for compliance.
